xmlText.hl2: ATP World Tour Open Sud de France Results
xmlText.p: Karen Khachanov, Russia, def. Ricardas Berankis, Lithuania, 6-2, 7-6 (11).
Damir Dzumhur (4), Bosnia-Herzegovina, def. Ruben Bemelmans, Belgium, 7-5, 6-4.
Richard Gasquet (5), France, def. Pierre-Hugues Herbert, France, 7-6 (3), 5-7, 6-3.
Jo-Wilfried Tsonga (3), France, def. Nicolas Mahut, France, 7-6 (3), 6-7 (3), 7-6 (4).
Lucas Pouille (2), France, def. Carlos Taberner, Spain, 6-1, 6-2.
Benoit Paire, France, def. John Millman, Australia, 6-4, 7-6 (4).
Sander Arends, Netherlands, and Antonio Sancic, Croatia, def. Wesley Koolhof, Netherlands, and Artem Sitak, New Zealand, 3-6, 6-4, 10-5.
Ken and Neal Skupski, Britain, def. Jeremy Chardy and Fabrice Martin, France, 6-3, 6-4.
